title: i've been hacked
body: so i'm not really sure what to do other than sending a ticket to riot. my friend on the client sent me a link and fooled me into believing it was him and i logged onto the link. it took me to a proxy server and i knew right then something was up. i immediately logged into the website and tried changing my e-mail and password but it was too late. the changes go to an e-mail that i never registered to. now i'm really worried about the money i spent and my credit card and personal info. if i logout now i probably won't be able to log in again too. not sure what to do. help?
